verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I sought the Lord and I heard He was in me
God is dwelling in a heart of praise.
I sought the Lord in the midst of His people.
God is dwelling in His praise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us praise Him. Let us praise Him.
Let us praise Him in the song and dance.
Let us praise Him. Let us praise Him.
Let us praise Him in the dance.
